instructions: Open WhatsApp. Tap Settings . Tap Account . Tap Change Number . Tap Next . Enter your old phone number and new phone number. Tap Next . Tap Done .

Open WhatsApp. Swipe to the left on a conversation you want to save. Tap More . Tap Export Chat . Choose to either include all media within the chat or not. If you choose to save all media, the file size will be much bigger. Choose to email the file or save it somewhere else. The file is now a zip file that is easily extracted and read on another device.
